peters_algorithm.pita module¶

class peters_algorithm.pita.PetersAlgorithm[source]¶

Bases: object

Main class to run stochastic world generation for ReinforcementLearning applications

_get_user_args()[source]¶

Read args set by user; if none are given, args are set to files and directories in “examples”

Returns:

Contains args set by user

Return type:

args (namespace obj)

_to_xml(*, xml_string, file_name)[source]¶

Exports a given string to an .xml file

Parameters:

  • xml_string (str) – String that contains the environment

  • file_name (str) – Name of the file to be exported

run()[source]¶

Run peters_algorithm to create xml-file containing objects specified in config file. objects are given as xml by user
